website_summaries.verdict: The Sony HT-ST7 is a visually stunning sound bar with a fine feature set, but it doesn't sound as good as you'd expect at its sky-high price.
pros: The Sony HT-ST7 is the most stylish sound bar we've seen, with a brushed metal cabinet and solid build quality
It sports three HDMI inputs, plus Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio, allowing the sound bar to receive full surround-sound signals
And there's also built-in Bluetooth and NFC pairing, for simple instant-gratification listening
cons: The HT-ST7's sound has its merits, but overall it doesn't live up to its lofty price tag
AirPlay is a surprising omission at this price, especially given its superior sound quality
And there's no doubt that separate speakers are a better investment if you're serious about sound

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - but short-lived - quality.
customer_reviews.text: So this sound bar is really great. The quality is crisp and the bass really booms. However, I've had the bar for less than 6 months and it appears the internal processor is failing. Every so often there will be a loud stutter and it appears to lag for a few seconds before correcting. Is it a huge problem? Not really. But if I spent $1,200 I expect longevity and consistency. I'm sure you do too. I am going to contact Sony or the seller to correct the issue and will update then.
customer_reviews.author: iskur

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise we love it. Sound is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sound bar on 12/8/2014 (almost two full years from today). It was a dream to hook-up and we have never had one glitch with connectivity or anything. Until recently. One of the speakers (not the sub) has a little distortion at certain voice frequencies. Not a big deal as I tend to listen to it fairly loud when on the elliptical. The speaker is either $40 or $44 or so depending on which one it is. This minor problem we have encountered it the only reason I didn't give it five stars. Otherwise we love it. Sound is awesome. I can hear the sub in other rooms when my wife has a movie cranked up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: 5001craig

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this new sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this new sound bar. We replaced our HTCT660 which was quite good, with this higher end system. It was easy to set up and delivers very clear, accurate and room filling sound. The controls are simple, once you understand how to access the settings. I don't know how it compares to its replacement, the HTST 9, but my guess is that they are fairly similar and this is just $500 less expensive. I would recommend getting one of these while they are still available.
customer_reviews.author: KCB

customer_reviews.title: Little upset with this sound bar, even after setting ...
customer_reviews.text: Little upset with this sound bar, even after setting up the discreet connection to the sub the sound still drops out for a second or so too often - the two pieces are less than two feet from each other. Wish there was a way to run a wire between them. For this price it isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, bad software.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar sounds great however the software does't work with Sony TV's via the ARC so you can't control volume with the TV remote you have to use the sound bar remote. The ARC software is not stable. If you aren't using it with a Sony TV it's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sound bar you can buy; took four months to make up my mind. The Bluetooth function is amazing. I can walk around with my iPhone in my pocket listening to my playlists. The wireless subwoofer rattles my house and the sound from the bar itself is stellar. Put it in your cart and wait for the price to drop...
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soundbar!
customer_reviews.text: Received item ONE day after ordering! Thanks Amazon Prime! This soundbar performs very well, for what it is. The sub is spot on great too. Very pleased with quality of sound and build. Had experience with prior soundbars and this one excellent!! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounbar
customer_reviews.text: The best sound bar I have purchased. I would recommend putting the sub woofer behind you as it gives you a better surreal sound experience.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Powerful sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar may be expensive, but it is worth it. Crystal clear sound and a powerful subwoofer. Rated 4 stars since I received three defective ones in a row. The fourth one works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Fish.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Sounds amazing. And so powerful. Alarmingly powerful subwoofer, but you can dial it down to whatever level you like. Sound mode presets for music, TV, movies and football are well equalized. The best designed audio remote I have seen in my entire life. I love these speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Tony B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has amazing sound! We added this our system and made a wonderful difference. Movies really surrounded you.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound. No need to configure or calibrate
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. No need to configure or calibrate. The remote is very easy to work with. Works great also with ChromeCast but I had to use hdmi extension.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Wow, powerful sound!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail, was considering the Yamaha, sonos, B&W, bose versions of the soundbar. This product definitely does not disappoint. The sound is clear and perfect for your needs. Connected to my cell phone within seconds for music playback. So far so good, will update if any changes once the speakers get some breaking in. The wireless subwoofer connected without any issues, quick and easy. I currently have a definitive technology setup with receiver, it can get much louder, but...who turns on their speakers that loud? In terms of quality variation, will need more time to tell.
customer_reviews.author: ohmegosh

customer_reviews.title: Finally the sound of the movie theather comes home.
customer_reviews.text: Sony always does it right... great sound for our small space... easy setup and wonderful remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Keller

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best soundbars out there
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best soundbars out there.I am very happy with my purchase and haven't encounter a problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: lovearts

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I can't claim to be an audiophile, but I appreciate good sound. Enough so, that I've setup a home theater with all McIntosh equipment (you audiophiles will know what that means...spare no expense...best sound possible). Well, I'm at an age when convenience and simplicity have become increasingly important. The Sony HTST7 Sound Bar, meets both of those criteria...while at the same time, not giving too much ground on sound quality. I'm a satisfied customer, and happily recommend it to you non-audiophiles out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected and I expected it to be very nice.
customer_reviews.author: EMP Clint

customer_reviews.title: Sony  HTST7 HD  Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: The best sound and amazing connectivity to my Sony 50 inch flatscreen. GREAT value, a bit pricey, but worth it. Having the subwolfer (sp) wireless is great too. Thxs.
customer_reviews.author: William Harlan

customer_reviews.title: SOUNDS GOOD AND HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: AFTER YOU (OR I) GET OVER THE PRICE SHOCK, A VERY GOOD SOUND TO ENHANCE THE TV, AND NOT HAVE TO SET UP A RECEIVER, SPEAKERS, ETC FOR A FULL SURROUND COMPOUNT SYSTEM. I HAVE A 7 YR OLD GOOD SONY RECEIVER BUT AFTER MOVED HOMES 5 YEARS AGO, JUST NOT GOTTENED AROUND TO ITS SET UP, REALLY DIDN'T WANT TOO!! SO, THIS SOUND BAR IS GOOD, NOT AS GOOD AS COMPONENTS, BUT THE SUB WOOFER ADDS A GOOD TOUCH, AND CAN BE A SIGNIFICANT SOUND, IT DESIRED AND WOOFER VOLUME IS SO ADJUSTED! EXTREMELY GOOD HEAVY CONSTRUCTION AND HEAVY SUB WOOFER. A GOOD PURCHASE 11
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The sound and functions are superb. I play my music from my tablet connected by bluetooth only. The sound is incredible. I like being able to adjust the level of base independtly.
customer_reviews.author: Dominie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Soundbar!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is expensive for a sound bar but the sound is amazing. I chose this because I didn't want to run wiring and read great reviews for this sound bar. I haven't been disappointed. Super crisp sound and nice bass from the wireless sub. 3 HDMI inputs! Bluetooth pairing was super fast and ez. The sound bar looks, feels & sounds high quality. Only thing, don't expect true surround sound from a sound bar or you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Lin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Totally love it. I had the Bose 3 piece system bit No Blue Tooth and No Volume Voice control this has both! Ive had it for about a Month and it is amazing
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I moved to a smaller retirement residence and gave up my media room with all the full sound equipment and replaced it with this product. The sound is excellent and I love the wireless sub woofer AND the bluetooth ability to stream music from either my phone or iPad. One things to be aware of is that the wireless transmitters can easily be inserted incorrectly and of course the wireless subwoofer doesn't work when you do that.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bradford

customer_reviews.title: only way to watch movies!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is a amazing sound bar!! you feel like you are at the theater,you really feel the explosins !!! only downfall is television , they don't broadcast true surround sound so it sounds a little tinny,,,,but if you get the sony bdp-s6200 Blu-ray player,it's Netflix,amazon and vudu apps. support true surround sound now...and Pandora sounds fantastic too!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, vivid clarity
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, vivid clarity, booming bass for bass lovers, less bass settings for those who favor treble. Setup is easy, price is okay when you compare it to the performance and minimalism of mid-higher end models (Bose, Sonos, B/O). This cannot be compared to your $200-$300 Costco sound bar -- Toyota vs Mercedes.
customer_reviews.author: SFLH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound. Pricey but I have found the lower ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. Pricey but I have found the lower priced ones don't do the trick. Dialog is clear and easy to hear over other sounds. The movie setting feels like a full stage presentation. I would unquestionably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Love This Unit!
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound Bar! Love not having the speaker wires etc. We're finely wire free except for the plugins/connections behind our Wall Unit that we can't see! Is it the same as 7.1 with all the speakers? No, not quite, but we'll take the difference. As for playing music I like it better. Tired of the Surround Sound with the damn vocals and drums and even lead guitars always on the center speaker etc. Most of us musicians still mix in stereo, hate surround unless its a movie. This plays much better. Great Bass too. Freaky Loud and Strong LoL! Want a nice system you don't have to think too much about, here it is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: so good. Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: so, so good. Works like a charm. Killer sound, I especially like the setting features. Wireless subwoofer works perfect. Expensive, but every bit worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: Sony sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the sound bar so far. If you have an existing full surround sound system and think this will give you equal sound quality, it won't. However, if you want great sound in a downsized package, then that is where this product shines IMO. Seamlessly connects to your device via Bluetooth for streaming music. 3 different voice modes. Standard, movie, music, football sound modes. Wireless subwoofer works great so far. My subwoofer is about 15 feet from soundbar and I have not had any connection issues. Use my Kindle HDX for Prime music and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Atomtraveler

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar for watching movies in smaller homes
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar for watching movies in smaller homes, but not music for some reason. Would give it four/fives stars if it wasn't for the rattling on one of the speakers I get occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: TheBugMan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: I fly for a living and don't hear voices as well any more. One reason I was attracted to this sound bar was because of the "voice" options. I really like the enhanced voice sound acuity with this sound bar. I am not a audiophile, so I was not interested in a complicated sound system. The simplicity of this sound bar is a strong selling point for me. Also, I do not own a receiver, and I did not want to purchase one, so a quality sound bar is good for my needs. The bluetooth feature is great. Easy to set up, and when friends come over they quickly connect to the sound bar to play their tunes.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is as good as sound bars get. GREAT sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Over a year usage and sounds crisp with ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Over a year usage and sounds crisp with good bass. Just not a good surround system
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality - EXCELLENT. Functionality - TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent, but the remote that it comes with and the overall functionality is terrible. I programmed a Logitech remote for this - the only big negative is that it can't electronically interface with a Samsung TV screen, so you can never tell what volume/setting the soundbar has if it is behind the TV. Sound field settings are too generic. "Stadium" / "Movie" / "TV" etc - would be much better if preset fields are a little more specific, or at least allow us to customize settings. A mixed bag really - I'd give it 3 stars, but it deserves a 2.5. Again, sound quality is great, everything else not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Paladin17

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this sound bar and subwoofer. It works perfectly in my living room and provides an excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: John Herson

customer_reviews.title: Good, but for the money I thought it would be better
customer_reviews.text: Sound bar projects clear crisp sound. However for the price tag on this thing I honestly expected to be blown away by the sound, unfortunately I wasn't. Good product but u can probably find a sound bar just as good but for a little bit less money
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T Ceseri

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, voice clarity is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: A little on the expensive side of soundbars but if you want the cream of the crop in soundbars you cannot go wrong with this bad boy!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Allison

customer_reviews.title: What a sound !
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed by the sound of the movies and set for the Bluetooth was a snap. I would recomind this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: The "Voice" setting almost makes this bar worth it alone
customer_reviews.text: Read the longer reviews for more info, but being able to up the dialogue in a movie without turning up the explosions and car crashes is a huge plus. Great sound, simple set-up, easy to use, just a bit pricey, but worth it in my book.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH S HERRES

customer_reviews.title: No BD audio on floor speakers
customer_reviews.text: Okay I have this hooked up to my hdtv,av receiver, dish VP722, floor speakers. I like it everything works fine,TV shows on sound bar.But...when I watch a BD, I lose audio from my floor standing speakers. BD audio on sound bar only. Have this hooked up per manual.Sound bar HDMI1 in to BD. Cant get audio on BD AND floor standing speakers. I will upgrade this review if and when I get this working.
customer_reviews.author: cybervette

customer_reviews.title: The initial hook up was a little challenge since the manual was kind of useless. End up finding answers on youtube
customer_reviews.text: It's been several months now since I bought this unit. The initial hook up was a little challenge since the manual was kind of useless. End up finding answers on youtube. I am most happy with the unit overall, not as great as some of the reviews I read. Kind of expensive.
customer_reviews.author: J. L

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Bass
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bass...pricey...large footprint...lots of power. I would order it again. Would be nice to be able to adjust treble and bass.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality of sound while listening to TV.
customer_reviews.text: The TV speakers we have had a better depth of sound than this sound bar for watching TV which is one of the key reasons we bought it. We were so disappointed we decided to return the sound bar. The quality of sound was considerably better for movies.
customer_reviews.author: suzapie

customer_reviews.title: Sony HTST7
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar did not full my room with the quality I expected from sony. While sitting in my chair the speaker did not full the room with surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas thurman

product_meta.title: Sony HTST7 HD Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer
product_meta.description: Marvel in true 7.1 surround sound from seven amplifiers and nine speakers in a single bar design that's redefining what a sound bar can be. Designed with the help of award-winning Hollywood sound engineers, this 450-watt system delivers full-range, Dolby TrueHD sound with the plug-and play simplicity of 3 HDMI inputs, plus Bluetooth audio for one-touch audio streaming from your Android or IOS mobile device. No other sound bar even comes close.
feature_bullets: Length & Power Output: 42.6-Inch 450 W (7.1 Channels) - Ideal for 46-Inch and larger TVs
Wall Mountable: Yes; Remote Included: No

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars121 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
